title: 2025 Gravel Worlds in Limbo: UCI Pivots from Planned Race in Nice Due to ‘Technical Difficulties’
content:
Governing body scrambling for new venue and date for UCI gravel world championships after ‘various constraints’ torpedo racing out of bustling French city.

Read the full article at 2025 Gravel Worlds in Limbo: UCI Pivots from Planned Race in Nice Due to ‘Technical Difficulties’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
